channel.title: Ubuntu on DarkAwesome
channel.description: Recent content in Ubuntu on DarkAwesome

item.title: Cyber Defense Analysis Part2
item.description: This is a continuation of the previous work done by Dimitri Nilov(https://www.gotechinsights.com/blog/part2cybertrend). When I started this project I was not aware of the work he had done intially. However, from a review of his work I have focused on a time series analysis of the attacks. Focusing primarily on 2014 - 2022 to see if any trends emerge from year to year.

item.title: Cyber Defense Analysis
item.description: Exploratory Analysis of the Cyber Events Database that collects publicy available information on cyber events, from 2014 to present.

item.title: Internship2023
item.description: I am looking for a job that suits my skills

item.title: Nextcloud
item.description: If you have knowledge, let others light their candles in it. -Margaret Fuller

item.title: Contact
item.description: I am Darkawesome, I am a jack of all trades. A master of none, but often times better than a master of one.

item.title: Snort
item.description: This is a project I did for my computer security class where I made an intrusion detection system (IDS) and attempted to make an intrusion prevention system (IPS)

item.title: Samba File Server
item.description: This was a Samba File server that I setup on my latptop running linux to send files from my pc to my laptop.
